lead_paragraph: Peter Moore was to be taken to an undisclosed location for a “period of decompression,” keeping him from becoming the focus of questions about his kidnapping and release.
snippet: Peter Moore was to be taken to an undisclosed location for a “period of decompression,” keeping him from becoming the focus of questions about his kidnapping and release.

headline.main: Freed Captive Is Reunited With His Family in Britain
headline.print_headline: Freed Captive Is Reunited With His Family in Britain
